Review.Titre: Terrible Company with Poor Customer  Service!!!
Review.Contenu: Purchased several items from WireCare.com on 12/15/21 which the website stated they were all in stock! On 12/16/2021 at 1:20pm cst I received an email from customer service stating that not all of the items I ordered were in stock and that the item(s) would be in stock approximately 1-1.5 months and that the remaining items would be shipped out then! Six (6) minutes later (I repeat 6 minutes later) I got a shipping notification! I responded to their email on 12/16/21 at 8:49pm stating I wanted to completely cancel my order if the order wasn’t complete. It should be noted that as of the morning of 12/17/2021 the item had not left their facility and wasn’t in the shipping companies possession due to the shipping log & and the date and time stamp when the shipping label was created. I received a emailed back from WireCare 12/17/2021 at 7:58am stating that the items had already shipped yesterday (complete & utter BS). This is absolutely terrible customer service!!! First, the quality on hand should be correct in your inventory, no where on the website did it state that the item(s) were on back order. Secondly, 6 minutes to respond to an email so I can cancel my whole order is not sufficient time whatsoever and why didn’t the company give me a call since it was a required field during checkout….? Third, why the heck would I want half my order… I wouldn’t have ordered the items if I didn’t need them! Lastly, when I asked to completely cancel my order before it had shipped the company canceled my back order item(s) and refund me for those items (which I never requested) I asked for  the whole order to be canceled and not shipped! This company is a complete joke. I do not recommend this company to anyone! I will be using Digi-Key for all of my purchases and at about half the price for the same items! WireCare of course stated I could return the items for a complete refund but I guess they don’t understand time =money! I would waste more money in postage, gas and payroll to have one of my employees ship the item back. First time using this company and absolutely the last time!

Review.Titre: We placed a order after seeing your…
Review.Contenu: We placed a order after seeing your advert for availability of the Deutsch DT connectors.This was a pretty large order, which payment was taken. We then received e mial stating that NONE of the connectors were currently available till January 2022 !!If goods are not available payment should not have been taken when its so long for delivery or stock levels should be shown on the ordering sheet before checkout.Disappointing.

Review.Titre: Really annoyed because they said it…
Review.Contenu: Really annoyed because they said it would be delivered by Monday and it is now Wednesday and just received an email saying it "should" ship today after asking them yesterday for a tracking number because I never received one. I'm spending over $40 to ship this stuff and it's going to be a week later then it told me when I purchased stuff. Disappointed in they're shipping process.

Review.Titre: Product indicated as in stock but actually is not
Review.Contenu: I had ordered DT06-2S DT Series - 2 Socket Plug and 1062-14-0144 	Stamped & Formed Socket which the website indicated as being in stock. However soon after entering the order I received an email indicating that these products were not in stock.I understand there is a supply issue but it would have been good to know they were out of stock.

The product I ordered did not have details on the ID or the OD. It did not display the minimum shrink, maximum shrink, or even the wall thickness. Since the description lacked all this information I was unable to size it correctly for my project. I intended to cover 12 AWG wires and so I ordered 12 AWG sheathing. It arrived with an OD much smaller than my wires.

Review.Titre: BACK-ORDERED - The entire order except (2) 2 pin…
Review.Contenu: The entire order except (2) 2 pin connector sets is backordered till July ? Why did the order pages indicate this to me ? I could have gotten the things from ebay and they would be here already .....  All the parts in the world do me no good on my project if they don't get here for my project. Will probably end up having to get them from ebay anyways to not delay my project any further ...  Thanks WireCare ....

Review.Titre: The catalog showed "In Stock" I placed…
Review.Contenu: The catalog showed "In Stock" I placed the order then received a confirmation that all shipped except the 3-pin male and female connectors, and that they were backordered for 5 weeks! It would have been nice to have the option to cancel, also its been 3 weeks and I have not received any updates on the status of the backorder!

I cannot speak to the quality of the product as I still haven’t received my order. The fact that I’m being asked for a review before the arrival of the order seems odd. I paid $18 on Monday for expedited shipping, from New Jersey to Ohio, on  a $14 order so I could complete a project over the weekend. Tracking tells me it should arrive tomorrow, eight days, $18.

Review.Titre: I dislike having to call looking for…
Review.Contenu: I dislike having to call looking for orders when it was to be a tueday delivery and I call late Wednesday to get an overnight delivery, yet I can get 10 emails on award points and other unnecessary marketing items. But the product was received thurday, it would have arrived Monday if it wasnt changed nor a call

The items they carry are excellent and I would love to continue to do business with them, HOWEVER the shipping is OUTRAGEOUS. I paid $55 for 2 small boxes from UPS. Being a business owner myself I do know what UPS business rates are and we were way overcharged.

Review.Titre: Being you sold me products that you…
Review.Contenu: Being you sold me products that you don't even have in stock, I'm very dissatisfied. Waiting 5-6 weeks and hoping they come in at that time is not what I call a good business deal. If you had entered "presently on back order" on your site, that would be considered good customer service and I'd consider doing business with WireCare in the future. Luckily, I was able to get the connectors needed elsewhere. I didn't cancel the backordered items being I used them quite often and will have them on hand. I don't expect we're going to be having many business deals, if any, in the future.

I paid for expedited 2-day shipping and it did not deliver in time. I actually did not even get notice of the tracking and new delivery date until the day it was originally supposed to deliver. I politely reached out to Customer Service to see if anything could be done to credit me for the $32 I paid for 2-Day Shipping and they said they could not and would not do anything.

Review.Titre: Cancellation due to incorrect info on website
Review.Contenu: Good Afternoon With regards to your order, we have an issue with it. Unfortunately, our website had the incorrect informationListed for the item that you ordered, C10-218JA, Safe-T Cable.These are only sold in packs of 50, and the price for that would be $172.50 Please let us know if you would like to order the pack of 50, (which we would need your credit card info so we can process it for you…you can call the officeWith that information.) Or if you would like to just get a refund back to your credit card. I apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you.

Review.Titre: Great customer service. Order fulfillment problems
Review.Contenu: Put in a small order to take advantage of a promotion. I ordered two shirts I thought would be white but got one white and one black. The rest of my order was as ordered delivered quicker than I thought. I received part of the promotion that was supposed to be sent. When I received the order to review I asked about the missing item. I received an immediate response stating it was shipped as well. Was not in the box.

Review.Titre: Like things about the site but still…
Review.Contenu: Like things about the site but still haven't received the order and don't have a tracking number 7 days post order.... and my status is "finalized"    Hopefully the product arrives soon.   I would think a tracking number is a minimal expectation in todays online world.   Even checking the order online there is no tracking number.
You took orders of things that are not in stock.

Review.Titre: Good product, very confusing ordering process
Review.Contenu: Good product, confusing part numbering system, and part of my order was wrong (one item missing, received another item I didn't order).  When I spoke with the person over the phone to straighten out the order, he rattled off the numbers too quickly to follow, and referred to different parts by the same name.  Found the online ordering process harder than it needed to be, ordering multiple components to make up a complete connector, even when using the "assembler"  feature.

Review.Titre: Website does not indicate if in stock
Review.Contenu: Website does not indicate if item is in stock, then they charge you for the item and then notify you it's out of stock.  I wouldn't mind if they told you up front, but this just feels sneaky or unprofessional.  Other sites I order from display on hand status of items so you know if you'll be waiting for the item.

Please show backorder on website! I ordered material that was apparently backordered without any notice of any kind. Not on the listing or on my emailed receipt. It WAS however in the final receipt inside my package.I quickly emailed upon receiving my package and was given an apology and a date when the item would be back in stock. A note for purchasers that backordered  items will be back in stock by X date would be useful so if we did want to purchase it still we can. Just need some kind of note about it somewhere.

Review.Titre: I realize the industry is struggling…
Review.Contenu: I realize the industry is struggling with having inventory for electrical components. but having components listed as in stock on your website is a maintenance issue.

Review.Titre: Paid for expedited shipping, still waiting
Review.Contenu: I ordered my item on 2/23 snd paid extra for 2 day shipping. Today, 3/1 I was sent a link to review my purchase, but the last information I have about my shipment is it was scanned in a warehouse in NJ on 2/27 and it’s late. I know they don’t control the USPS, but if you’re gonna offer expedited service for a fee, I’m pretty salty when I don’t have what I need. My purchase was to get a car back on the road and still she sits, waiting parts. I’m sure my item itself will be fine, but “send me this item whenever it gets here” isn’t what I paid for and so it’s not the service level I expect.

Review.Titre: Not what I expected Looks like nice stuff I’m sure it does…
Review.Contenu: Looks like nice stuff I’m sure it does a great job protecting wires. My problem is I was expecting split sleeve. This stuff is woven and needs a hot knife to cut and keep it from fraying. I should have studied the description better

Review.Titre: Failure to disclose items are out of stock indefinitely until after ordering
Review.Contenu: The products from Wirecare are fantastic.  However, the website does not indicate when a product is out of stock, even when Wirecare has no information on when it will be back in stock.  This is the second time that items that I needed in a hurry were out of stock indefinitely.When I brought this up with customer service, they stated "our website will never disclose if an item is out of stock".  That is not an acceptable answer when I am spending hundreds of dollars.Again, the components are great and when they are in stock they are shipped quickly, but the lack of indication that items are out of stock is a severe problem.

Review.Titre: I had to get my own tech support from…
Review.Contenu: I had to get my own tech support from the manufacturer when I received absolutely no response from you regarding items on your website. Then after placing my order I received no response regarding tracking etc so I inquired twice about the status. I was finally told that almost half.of what I ordered was on back order. I would have rather been told this during the ordering process. Its 2021, there's no reason not to have this information available at some point BEFORE payment. The only reason I'm even giving 2 stars is because of the prompt service from Michelle B for the refund and cancelling the order. This was also my first purchase from your company so I hope to have better luck the next time.

Review.Titre: Solid resource, but shipping kills it
Review.Contenu: Good products, but shipping kills it for me. I'd prefer you be straight up with customers and just raise the prices rather than tack on exorbitant shipping fees for featherweight products...

Review.Titre: Estimated delivery time was well beyond…
Review.Contenu: Estimated delivery time was well beyond the time frame I was hoping fo,r but I ordered anyway. Only to find out the item is back ordered and it will be weeks before I will get it? Sorry, not too thrilled!

Sorry, but I was unhappy with your online store for the following reasons:I put the products I needed in the cart, believing that if the product is available for payment and it can be paid for, then it is in stock. After I paid for the purchases and delivery (not cheap), after a while they wrote to me in the mail that some goods were out of stock and some of the money would be returned to me on the card. In a letter, I asked the seller to wait with the shipment while I revise the configuration of the goods I need based on what is in stock. But the seller never answered my mail. And I sent the item with the missing items from the cart and returned the difference to the card. As a result, I did not spend quite efficiently on delivery, and did not update the cart based on the availability of goods.

Review.Titre: Website needs to be updated with…
Review.Contenu: Website needs to be updated with current inventory. When I placed an order, the site did not prompt "out of stock" for the item. This will help me with which item to purchase.
A lot of cool products. But I paid extra for 2 day shipping and my order didn’t ship for 3 days. I’m still waiting for my package. It’s been with USPS for 4 days 😕

Review.Titre: Well when I received the order I was…disappointed in the quality
Review.Contenu: Well when I received the order I was disappointed in the quality of the kit .you can buy the exact same kit for 130$ ,I expected a better quality from wire care

Review.Titre: website would not allow me to place an…
Review.Contenu: website would not allow me to place an order. Had to call in and speak with customer service. She was great, but the website was frustrating.
I explicitly asked for tracking information days ago and still have not received it.  I was only told that the order has shipped.

in my recent order I had a couple of issues, I contacted your company and left a voice mail explaining my issue with my order but I never received any  response !    1.   I ordered a AP- 100 tension tool but it does not tighten the ties as expected the ties still remain loose and have to be finished by hand (just pulling them by hand to finish)      2. I ordered MPAO .75 BK with adhesive, but what I received was MPNO.75 BK no adhesive backing  But after calling and leaving messages to correct the problem to date I have still not received a call back so that I can get the issue resolved. at which time I will be happy to edit my review to reflect the solution reached'  ***** I need to mention that I have ordered in the past and have never had any complaints with the product or the services so I am hoping the this is a simple issue with the operations due to Covid changes in operations and will be resolved to everyone's satisfaction
Shipping times are way too long for the lack of competitive pricing. I still haven't received my order
been well over a week since ordered and paid. no shipping updates on site. holding up customer car. will be looking for new source

Review.Titre: Did not have product in stock.
I placed an order but have no parts…
Review.Contenu: I placed an order but have no parts shipped.  Please ship the parts
Received the items as described, but when cutting it with heated blade still frills.
What a joke!!!! Didn't even have half of the order.

Review.Titre: I was given no tracking number and have…
Review.Contenu: I was given no tracking number and have no idea how my items are shipping.

Review.Titre: I havent received my order yet
Review.Contenu: I haven't received my order so I am unable to give an honest review
Still did not receive item or any feedback on why item was not shipped.

Review.Titre: Five days to ship is not consistent…
Review.Contenu: Five days to ship is not consistent with today’s marketplace.

Review.Titre: Did not get half of the order.
OUR INVENTORY ON-LINE IS NO UP TO DATE
Review.Contenu: YOUR INVENTORY ON-LINE IS NOT UP TO DATE

Review.Titre: waited days to ship out a package
Needed prompting to get the order out the door.
Review.Contenu: Sent in an order for 3 4x4 conduit. Price seemed great at the time. Almost a week later and still didn't get a shipping confirmation. Went back to the website and sent a message. Next day I get the shipping info. I'm thinking great now we are getting somewhere. Product shows up and it's plastic. It's all cheap ass plastic. Thought I'd ordered metal. Went back to the product page and no where in the description does it reference what it's made out of. So beware....if cheap ass plastic is what you are looking for, then this is it. I also sent in an inquiry asking if plastic is all they had. I've yet to receive a response.

Review.Titre: easy to order, but they forgot to ship.
Review.Contenu: They claim to be "worlds best shipper" but they didn't ship my order even after they sent an email saying "Has Been Shipped in the Fastest Time Known to Man". You probably shouldn't make such bold statements if you can't back it up. Customer service has been very helpful and polite, and ordering online was a piece of cake so I will be a return customer, but please get your shipping figured out.

Shipping- took longer than expected, but the real issue would be the website, needs suggestions so you order all the parts to make the connections complete. Because of that I ended up setting the plugs aside and hardwiring it since no one local has the Deutsch connector in stock

From the date of order placed, to order shipped emails, it was almost a week. I don’t by any means expect next day for my order to be shipped, but for items supposedly in stock a week is far too long. Everything showed up as it should, but if I knew it would be a week before my items were even shipped I wouldn’t have payed for expedited shipping.

Review.Titre: I ordered things I did not need
Review.Contenu: I ordered things I did not need. On your web if you put in that you want #F6N coverings it says it doesn't have so I go through all catagories and found it but not before I ordered a full line of coverings I don't need and won't use.

Review.Titre: Be mindful to order by diameter
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately I ordered too large. It would help if you made it a bit more clear that this should be ordered by diameter, not linear. Yes, it is noted, quite small at the bottom of the page,which I only saw after they arrived so much larger than I needed. Perhaps you need to put that in the ordering section.
First, I have yet to receive the order so receiving this survey is a bit premature. Second, I feel that $20 shipping charge is a bit expensive given that I only purchased 6 empty 6"x2" spools.

I attempted to 'special order' a crimping tool along with some regular stocked items but some of the stocked items were out and confusion over the special order item.  I ended up cancelling the order and plan on trying again when they stated the items are expected to be in stock.

Review.Titre: Shipping options could be a lot…
Review.Contenu: Shipping options could be a lot better/faster and more granularly quoted based on what is being ordered.I spec'd out an order for a 10 position DT connector and I ordered everything properly except for the snap in  pin-retainers. Would have been really cool if someone spotted my error and sent me a message "hey it looks like you forgot a component of your connector, do you wanna update that before we ship?" (I should have used the connector builder but google hyperlinked me to the parts page directly and I didn't know it existed until later.)I know this is a stretch but it was pretty painful to pay standard shipping cost on two tiny pieces of plastic that would fit in a padded mailer and have to wait another five days or more for the shipping.All that being said I'm totally still a wirecare customer.

Review.Titre: I needed my reamer and was not sent or…
Review.Contenu: I needed my reamer and was not sent or told it was on backorder. When will item be sent with tracking information
Great products. Shipping was out of control. $53 for 8 spark plug heat covers. They need to find way cheaper shipping options.
Great service, fast delivery….BUT….the kit was missing all of the DT 2-pin receptacle parts….????

Review.Titre: This is the second time zip ties were…
Review.Contenu: This is the second time zip ties were missing from order.
The item I received was not the type I ordered! The cost is so minimal I decided to just keep it even though I have no use for it. SMDH
Not having the stock we need and being on backorder.
Product is good. Price seems a bit high for zip ties . We will see how they work out as I use them

Review.Titre: In stock does not mean in stock
Review.Contenu: The tool I ordered in June was “in stock” a week after ordering I received an email informing me they are out of stock and will ship sometime in October. No other options were provided just wait a few months to fulfill my order.

Ordered two items, both t-shirts, along with my other items.  Both t-shirts were not available, nor was I offered the free t-shirt for my order over $50.  If they are not going to offer the shirts anymore, they need to pull them from the website and offer a full explanation.  Very disappointed.

Review.Titre: Sent me a spliced roll of tech flex that made my task very hard
Review.Contenu: Sent me a spliced roll of tech flex . I ordered a thousand foot roll so I could use it on a thousand foot run . I had to get creative to make it look good and be functional. I love the product just would like to get a continuous roll when I order one . 60 ft then splice that cannot open due to being melted together when spliced . Unacceptable.

Review.Titre: Not enough info online to make a good decision.
Review.Contenu: I was unable to use the item I purchased because the type of material was not suitable for my need. More product information made available on your website would have been helpful.

Your website is almost perfect. I quickly found what I needed, and ordered the items. The next day, I was informed that my order contained out of stock items with a two month delay on delivery. I cancelled the order. Your website should notify customers of out of stock items BEFORE the order is placed and payment is made.

Review.Titre: The one item I really needed showed in…
Review.Contenu: The one item I really needed showed in stock but is apparently backordered. It still shows in stock on your site. I would have ordered somewhere else if I had known. The other items I ordered just to add on to the order are nice so 3 stars.

They told me after shipment that half of the items are backordered. I understand there is a global shortage but I am left with a bunch of parts that I can't use until I get the remainder. I got a free t-shirt but I'm still just stuck waiting.Shipping for the first half was very fast though and customer service was friendly.

The product purchased was great.  It was just what I wanted and what I could not find in Canada at this time.  I was a bit displeased with the transport costs to Canada but figure shipments to Canada are not many so lowering the shipping costs to Canada based on frequency is not available.  For about $9.00 US in product costs, shipping to Canada was $30.00 US.  With high shipping costs, unless I am ordering a lot of product to make it worth while, my future purchasing will be limited.

"How did we do?"Well it's not indicated on the site that the DT06-4S is out of stock. It's only after I placed my order, and they've got my money, that I'm told that the parts I need won't be available till February. I didn't cancel my order with because as it turns out the item that I'm using these connectors for is also not available for a a while. I'm not exactly a happy customer, however, on the bright side, everything else I ordered shipped quickly and I should have it soon. Three stars for now, we'll see how future orders go.

Good customer service.  Fair price for the product.  Using the Durabraid to protect my new trolling motor power cables.  Shipping too much for 5’ of 3/4” Durabraid through USPS.  The 3” x 3” roll of Durabraid came in a 18”x 18”x 6” box!  Come on, $6.99 shipping for a $10.30 purchase of something that probably doesn’t weigh a couple of ounces.  Disingenuous to customers to nick them on shipping like that.  Other than that, everything good.

Why can't we print out an invoice? Iam a reseller and need to have a legitimate copy of my invoice? There is no way to Download it so it can be printed out or put it in a PDF? Are you guys just selling out of a I phone or somethingVery annoying

Review.Titre: When I get it I’m sure it will be great.
Review.Contenu: It will get here today. I’ll let you know when it arrives and I actually get to see it. Second notice for a review on a package that hasn’t made it here yet. I know, it’s not your fault and I’m not angry about the delivery time. Maybe somehow send these out after delivery has been confirmed. It is annoying to get these beforehand.

Wire care is a good source for some hard to find items. I really like the selection. However, the site is a bit misleading for ordering Stamped and Formed pins and sockets. The site shows strips of pins and sockets, but pricing and ordering is for individual items, not complete strips as pictured. This resulted in me having to place a second order to get all the items I needed. For the second order, time from order to shipping over 3 days.

Review.Titre: Some of the items I chose are on back…
Review.Contenu: Some of the items I chose are on back order but I was already charged for them.One should be notified if the item is not in stock, and if one chooses to get a back-ordered item, them one should only pay for it once it is available. That is standard practice with other merchants.Otherwise good product and fast delivery.I will buy again from them, but now i know to call and confirm the item is in stock before i place my order.

The website has good information.  It was easy to view the components, look up information and purchase.  The only issue I had was with the tool I purchased. It was missing parts, and did not perform as advertised.  I don't believe that this is any fault of wirecare.com.  The tool is a knock off of the more expensive version.

Review.Titre: Lots of color options, not exactly what i was looking for
Review.Contenu: Didn't have the size i needed. Got a size to small because it explands but as it expands the gaps between the material get larger which i was trying to avoid. Wanted dark purple tight weave but they only had that color in the regular stuff. Guy i called assured me you wouldn't be able to see the cable beneath with the regular stuff. Bought a test strip, yes you can very much see underneath

Surprise duties and brokerage fees. However as a client from outside of the US, Wirecare is not worth purchasing from because all brokerage is done at the border with extremely large fees and unforeseen duties. Unlike amazon or DigiKey or RockAuto and other companies, who have determined the complete cost of shipping and duties before the purchase is complete. No surprises or hidden fees.

Most places these days have free shipping they dont, sometimes shipping is more then the price of what I’m ordering, I’ve order RED heat shrink and on two different occasions,  it comes and it’s pink, not red, I have ordered other red heat shrink from them and it’s red, even in the same size but then it comes and it’s pink when ordered again.

Review.Titre: Slow shipping and no tracking number
Review.Contenu: I placed an order for auto wiring harness supplies I needed for a job. I ordered items from 2 other companies (competitors) at the same time. Picked standard shipping for all of them. WireCare was several days behind but no further away from me than the other 2 companies. I can only assume the delay was in the packaging/handling time. Unfortunately, I have no way to know because I also never received a tracking number, or a shipping notification of any kind.I'm willing to try again with my next order, as the products are good quality. Hopefully, the next time will go smoothly.

Review.Titre: Don’t have it yet how can I write a…
Review.Contenu: Don’t have it yet how can I write a review?

Review.Titre: Product seems to be of high quality and…
Review.Contenu: Product seems to be of high quality and will work great. Product itself was priced reasonable but the shipping was astronomical for how far it shipped and what it weighed. $21 for a 3 lb box seemed high maybe check into cheaper shipping quotes when most places now adays offer free shipping. Thanks

Everything I have ordered thru the site has been great quality with quick shipping,  the reason for only 3 stars is the website does not tell you if a product is out of stock until you make the purchase. Kinda frustrating Overall WireCare has been great

Placed order on a  Saturday. Paid extra for shipping so I would receive following Friday to have in time for a project Saturday. Order didn’t ship until Wednesday so I didn’t receive order until Monday after project was to be completed. Had to make a second trip to site to finish

Review.Titre: Back orders ??I gave 3 stars because I was notified 3…
Review.Contenu: I gave 3 stars because I was notified 3 days after purchase that the item is back ordered. Some sites I purchase other items from will show on their site what is available and in stock and what is not. This is helpful to someone that needs a part sooner than later. So they can make a buying decision.  I know I have the option to cancel and go else where but I will wait it out. It’s to inconvenient to go thru the hassle. I was emailed promptly  though and notified of the situation so correspondence to me is important and as soon as my order arrives i may review again as to the quality of the product. Glad to help.

Delivery was slower than expected.  New Jersey to Ohio should be 2, maybe 3 days without having to pay for premium freight.Delivery tube was crushed and bent.  Good thing that the heat shrink tubing could not be damaged.Heat shrink tubing was not as described.  I was looking for a co-extruded material that is really water-tight when used.  The inner (usually white) material 'oozes' when heated and then freezes and will not allow any water intrusion.  The stuff I got is more like normal hardware store heat shrink tubing.  I was disappointed.

Thought closer geographically would be faster.  Don't think so.Review request showed up before product was in hand,  It missed the expected delivery date.Items are ppd (postage paid) if purchased from CA.  I'm in a bordering state away.

Review.Titre: Only complaint that I would have is it…
Review.Contenu: Only complaint that I would have is it was misleading (to me) as to the quantity of what I wanted to order. When I ordered what I thought was 3 pkgs all I received was 3 guides instead of 3 packages .

I'm still waiting for 12ga. Wire I'm very disappointed that there was zero communication to me that the blue wire was backordered until I opened the package and the packing slip indicated the wire was backordered. Someone could have reached out asking if I could use a different color or gauge.  Additionally over two months ago I submitted a question on your website through " contact us" and to date I never received a response, yes I checked my spam and I received your usual sales information.   In the mean time I have made Amazon orders for wire and supplies and have received all items.  So I'm questioning whether spending the time and energy dealing with wire care is worth the extra effort.

I ordered two identical items. It was only later that I was informed that there was only one being shipped, the other was going to be shipped at a later date.This should have been made known to me at the time of ordering and paying.I am still waiting.

Review.Titre: Shipping was too pricey for the time it…
Review.Contenu: Shipping was too pricey for the time it took

Review.Titre: With such great merchandise you would…
Review.Contenu: With such great merchandise you would think from the time I placed my order and the time I actually received my order would be a whole lot faster than almost 2 weeks. Very disappointed that it took almost a week for them to ship after receiving my order

Poor product description or search engine. Was looking for 3M thick wall heat shrink with the sealant inside for a commercial installation. Got the thin wall shrink that would not last in the environment it was going to be used in.

My second order, there was some confusion on quantity to ship.  The shipping was almost 2x more than another supplier.  A simple paper envelope would have worked, in US Mail.  When I called, felt a little like I was asking for a favor.  Ehhhh.

Review.Titre: Quick shipment and customer service, but inaccurate part descriptions
Review.Contenu: Quick shipment and customer service. Website description is inaccurate. Description calls out M6, but after receiving actual product is standard. Confirmed with manufacturer of product that parts are just mislabeled.

Review.Titre: I like your site very much
Review.Contenu: I like your site very much.  Easy to navigate and choose products. Ok, now for the improvement area:  product availability.  I was informed that my order is now backordered and 2-3 weeks out.  I think you should improve in this area

Review.Titre: No email with tracking number information
Review.Contenu: I placed my order .. then after i received an email with purchased order information.. I was hoping to get another email with some kind of tracking number information.. but I never did .. and that’s a no no for me

Review.Titre: Did not have all items in stock
Review.Contenu: Did not have all items in stock. Backordered items, and sent me what they could. I did not get a positive feeling that Wirecare is going to follow through on the backordered item.

Review.Titre: I got the shrink tubing for CAT5e but…
Review.Contenu: I got the shrink tubing for CAT5e but it was much too large. Im sure it was my fault but if you guys could put something somewhere that just says "Great for CAT5e! or Cat6" that would help us out a ton.

Review.Titre: Very bright colors and nice design
Review.Contenu: Very bright colors and nice design, but the wire is quite stiff and the extension cord is heavy to carry around.  It is intended for a portable lamp used a couple of days a week for a craft hobby held at different locations.

Haven’t received the package yet, lost somewhere in the USPS network.What else is new, you really need to use other means of sending your packages since the USPS has shown that they cannot deliver the mail.

Review.Titre: Easy to use site / lacks backorder status
Review.Contenu: The ease of the site, and shipping is great.  The downside is that the site doesn't show backordered items.  If that could be fixed, the buying process would be seamless!
Great product, expensive shipping.

Had I known Wirecare wouldn't deliver, I could have found the backordered parts on other sites. Instead I had to pay yet more rush charges to place additional orders for the parts Wirecare missed.I like Wirecare's usability and detail. Prices are often 50% above those of competitors, which when I placed my order I assumed was because it kept all listed parts in stock. I was willing to pay a premium for that, but paying a premium doesn't make sense when parts are out of stock and not identified as such. Fix the interaction between the inventory system and the web site and customers won't get disappointed like me!

Review.Pseudo: Aaron Esparza, Turbine Engine Specialists, Inc.
Review.Contenu: My company was in need of a new cable gun kit. I sourced them from multiple vendors and saw that you were the only one that did not have a shipment disclaimer on the product page. I called first to request a price match, as your unit is $700 more than all of the other vendors, including DMC. I was told that you do not offer price matching, but the unit would be received into your facility on Monday 12/30. I thought, Time is money so I might as well go ahead and get this unit since I do not have to wait. I received tracking a few days later for a single part of my order. Once the unit received I initiated a chat with Wire Care and requested an update only to be told that the unit was ordered from DMC and usually takes about 4-6 weeks to process through them before even shipping to me. If I knew this ahead of time I would have just purchased the unit from another vendor for the lower amount. Feels a bit bait and switchy in my opinion. I did request that the amount be credited but was told that since the margins were so thin on this unit that was not a possibility.I find it hard to believe that someone who has a relationship with Daniels would not have a better discount than what they list on their own website to consumers. Edited 1/7/2020I would like to add that the wire care team reached out and advised of the miscommunication issue. I appreciate their professionalism on this matter and their method for handling our concerns.

Review.Titre: Quality components that do not match up...upgrade your website
Review.Contenu: Quality components, but...Your 8-10 awg pin (0460-204-08141) and sockets (0462-203-08141) do not at all fit with your similarly guaged plug(DTP06-4S-RD) and receptical (DTPO4-4P-RD). There is no way to tell this from your website. In fact your website is hard to match components as you have to scroll and guess, then read all the specs, and roll the dice to see if they work. So those 8 items pin and sockets were a waste of money as well as the crimper I bought to try and make them work. Didn't even try because the plug and receptacle were so obviously off. Edit-improved review based on incorrect info in original review. Other than this inconvenience and doubling the cost of my order, the components seem like good quality. The deutsch connectors work much better than the weather-tech connectors I previously used and they are rated for more current which could not be done with the other ones. Update: customer service reached out and refunded me for the incorrect components. Also, they pointed out they have a page on their website that can match the various components to your task. Thanks for the help. Review improved accordingly.

If I were Wirecare I would avoid using the USPS at all cost, to avoid problems like this in the future.
